item.description:
Before you sell your property and invest in a new one - come hear Mark Couture of Exchange Authority. He'll discuss the strategies for utilizing 1031 Exchanges. If you qualify, you can postpone all the capital gains tax on the sale of your property!

Join us for the Boston AREIA D.E.N. - Deals, Exchange Network.

WHEN: 1st Tuesday of Every Month 6:30 PM - Next D.E.N. February 2, 2010 - Enjoy Networking, Deals, Prizes and Fun!!!

WHERE: Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

WHAT: Networking, Deals Exchange, Featuring:
**Deal or NO DEAL** - Get your deals analyzed by a panel of local real estate experts! To be a candidate to submit your deals - email Bernadette (Bernadette@bostonareia.com) today!

Cost: $25 for visitors, FREE for Members of Boston AREIA


***SAVE THE DATE - BRING YOUR DEALS - BRING LOTS OF BUSINESS CARDS AND COME PREPARED TO NETWORK!***

Then, Mark Couture will discuss strategies for 1031 Exchanges!

You'll learn:

Basics - brief history of 1031s, what qualifies, timelines
Myths - 2-party swaps, owner-occupied multis, multi to multi/CRE to CRE
Issues with 1031s - entity selection, year-end exchanges
STRATEGIES for utilizing 1031 exchanges:
Beginner: sell 1 property and add more debt to acquire larger property
Intermediate:
Reverse Exchanges - buy before you sell
Construction Exchanges - buy rehab to maximize returns
Exchanging into a rental condo in FL for future considerations
Major maintenance avoidance: 7-10 plan
Advanced:
Preface: why refinancing to buy more property should be your last option
Exponentially growing unit holdings - turn a 3-unit into 9 units, then 9 into 27, etc.
Turn a property with debt into a zero debt cash cow
Combined "zero debt cash cow" and "exponential growth"
the "360-day exchange"
Turn a multi into a multi and beach rental without increasing debt

D.E.N. Meeting
When: 6:30 PM, Tuesday, February 2, 2010
Where: Doubletree Guest Suites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston, MA
Cost: Free for members; $25 for non-members
